about-dialog.license-text-license: GNU Affero General Public License, Version 3
about-dialog.issues-text: If something does not work or you have a suggestion for improvement, please report on the {{tracker}}.
about-dialog.help-text: If you have a question, please have a look at the {{documentation}}, raise a question in the {{discussions}} or ask in the {{chat}}.
about-dialog.map-data-geoip-description: This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from {{maxmind}}.

client-provider.disconnected: The connection to the server was lost. Trying to reconnect…

edit-filter-dialog.title: Filter
edit-filter-dialog.introduction: Here you can set an advanced expression to show/hide certain markers/lines based on their attributes. The filter expression only applies to your view of the map, but it can be persisted as part of a saved view or a shared link.
edit-filter-dialog.data-description-2: For checkbox fields, the value is {{uncheckedValue}} (unchecked) or {{checkedValue}} (checked).

edit-type-dialog.delete-field-message: Do you really want to delete the field “{{fieldName}}”?
edit-type-dialog.field-disappeared-error: The field cannot be found on the type anymore.
edit-type-dialog.unique-field-name-error: Multiple fields cannot have the same name.
edit-type-dialog.title: Edit Type
edit-type-dialog.name: Name
edit-type-dialog.styles-introduction: These styles are applied when a new object of this type is created. If “Fixed” is enabled, the style is applied to all objects of this type and cannot be changed for an individual object anymore. For more complex style control, dropdown or checkbox fields can be configured below to change the style based on their selected value.
edit-type-dialog.show-in-legend-description: An item for this type will be shown in the legend. Any fixed style attributes are applied to it. Dropdown or checkbox fields that control the style generate additional legend items.

edit-type-dropdown-dialog.delete-option-message: Do you really want to delete the option “{{value}}”?
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.unique-value-error: Multiple options cannot have the same label.
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.no-options-error: Controlling fields need to have at least one option.
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.label: Label (for legend)

history-dialog.title: History
history-dialog.introduction: Here you can inspect and revert the last 50 changes to the map.

history-utils.revert-create-marker-message-named: Do you really want to delete the marker {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-create-marker-message-unnamed: Do you really want to delete this marker?
history-utils.revert-create-line-message-named: Do you really want to delete the line {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-create-line-message-unnamed: Do you really want to delete this line?
history-utils.revert-create-view-message-named: Do you really want to delete the view {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-create-view-message-unnamed: Do you really want to delete this view?
history-utils.revert-create-type-message-named: Do you really want to delete the type {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-create-type-message-unnamed: Do you really want to delete this type?
history-utils.revert-update-map-message: Do you really want to restore the old version of the map settings?
history-utils.revert-update-marker-message-named: Do you really want to restore the old version of the marker {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-update-marker-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore the old version of this marker?
history-utils.revert-update-line-message-named: Do you really want to restore the old version of the line {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-update-line-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore the old version of this line?
history-utils.revert-update-view-message-named: Do you really want to restore the old version of the view {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-update-view-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore the old version of this view?
history-utils.revert-update-type-message-named: Do you really want to restore the old version of the type {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-update-type-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore the old version of this type?
history-utils.revert-delete-marker-message-named: Do you really want to restore the marker {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-delete-marker-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore this marker?
history-utils.revert-delete-line-message-named: Do you really want to restore the line {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-delete-line-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore this line?
history-utils.revert-delete-view-message-named: Do you really want to restore the view {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-delete-view-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore this view?
history-utils.revert-delete-type-message-named: Do you really want to restore the type {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-delete-type-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore this type?

leaflet-map-components.pois-too-many-results: Not all POIs are shown because there are too many results. Zoom in to show all results.

legend-content.click-explanation: Click to show/hide objects of this type.

line-info.delete-line-message: Do you really want to delete the line “{{name}}”?
line-info.move-line-message: Use the routing form or drag the line around to change it. Click “Finish” to save the changes.

marker-info.delete-marker-message: Do you really want to delete the marker “{{name}}”?

multiple-info.delete-objects-message_one: Do you really want to remove {{count}} object?
multiple-info.delete-objects-message_other: Do you really want to remove {{count}} objects?

overpass-form.custom-explanation-1: Enter an {{statement}} here. Settings and an {{out}} statement are added automatically in the background. For ways and relations, a marker will be shown at the geometric centre, no lines or polygons are drawn.
overpass-form.custom-explanation-2: Example queries are {{parking}} to get parking places or {{atm}} for ATMs.

pad-id-edit.unique-id-error: The same link cannot be used for different access levels.

pad-settings-dialog.delete-map-message: Are you sure you want to delete the map “{{name}}”? Deleted maps cannot be restored!
pad-settings-dialog.admin-link-description: When opening the map through this link, all parts of the map can be edited, including the map settings, object types and views.
pad-settings-dialog.write-link-description: When opening the map through this link, markers and lines can be added, changed and deleted, but the map settings, object types and views cannot be modified.
pad-settings-dialog.read-link-description: When opening the map through this link, markers, lines and views can be seen, but nothing can be changed.
pad-settings-dialog.search-engines-description: If this is enabled, search engines like Google will be allowed to add the read-only version of this map.
pad-settings-dialog.map-description-description: This description will be shown under the result in search engines.
pad-settings-dialog.cluster-markers-description: If enabled, when there are many markers in one area, they will be replaced by a placeholder at low zoom levels. This improves performance on maps with many markers.
pad-settings-dialog.legend-text-description: Text that will be shown above and below the legend. Can be formatted with {{markdown}}.
pad-settings-dialog.delete-description: To delete this map, type {{code}} into the field and click the “Delete map” button.

user-preferences-dialog.title: User preferences
user-preferences-dialog.introduction: These settings are stored on your computer as a cookie and are applied independently of the opened map.
user-preferences-dialog.language-description: Some translations may not be complete yet. Translations are created by the community, feel free to contribute on {{weblate}}.

route-form.some-destinations-not-found: Some destinations could not be found.

search-box.resize-tooltip: Drag to resize, click to reset
